mapper.select: select BG.board_category_no,BC.board_category_name,HS.board_title,HS.board_content, HS.board_count,HS.board_date,HS.company_name,HS.member_name from board_category_group BG left outer join board_category BC on BC.board_category_no = BG.board_category_no inner join Hashtag_search_viewB HS on HS.board_no = BG.board_no where hs.hashtag_name=#{searchWord}
